data.title: Dell Telecom MultiCloud Foundation
data.meta_description: Dell Technologies is the leader in digital transformation, providing digital technology solutions, products, and services to drive business success.
data.text:
Dell Telecom Infrastructure Blocks make it easy to build the optimal foundation for your network. Each turnkey system is co-engineered with our cloud platform partners to meet specific workload requirements at scale. They include all the hardware, software and licenses needed to build and scale out your cloud platform. They come with hardware and software factory integrated to minimize the time spent downloading and configuring software onsite and are backed with a unified support model from Dell Technologies. The result? Streamlined design, configuration, delivery and support of your telco cloud infrastructure that accelerates the introduction of new technology.

Our Telecom Infrastructure Blocks for Wind River are based on Wind River Studio cloud software platform and are designed to support use cases for Virtual RAN and Open RAN.

Our new Telecom Infrastructure Blocks for Red Hat are based on Red Hat OpenShift and Red Hat Advanced Cluster Management for Kubernetes and are purpose built for OpenShift Management and Workload clusters running 5G Core and RAN workloads to simplify deployment of a consistent cloud platform from core to the far edge of the network.

"We’re building an open, cloud-native network with multiple vendors so we can deliver the best network experience for our customers. Testing and integrating various vendors demand too much of our time and budget. That's why, we’re now partnering with Dell Telecom Infrastructure Blocks to do the validation and testing for us, so we can focus on how we can use our modern network to deliver the services and benefits for our customers."

James Lim, Vice-President, Globe Telecom
